column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Eska says : " I will hate to leave this quaint tribe . "
#Text=Desna says : " Is that true , Eska ? "
#Text=Eska says : " Of course not , Desna , I will not miss it at all .
#Text=So - so funny .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You know , I 'll be really sad when you have to leave .
#Text=It 's been really great getting to know you .
#Text=Really .
#Text=" Eska says : " But you will be coming with me to the North .
#Text=There we will live the rest of our lives together in icy bliss .
#Text=Foolish Bolin .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Mako !
#Text=I 'm so happy to see you !
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , you all right , bro ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " No !
#Text=No , I 'm not all right .
#Text=I ca n't take anymore .
#Text=Listen , I do n't want to live in icy bliss with Eska !
#Text=Do n't make me .
#Text=Oh , please , please do n't make me .
#Text=" Mako says : " Uh , hey , if you 're that unhappy , just break up with her .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Break up with her ?
#Text=You can do that ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Yeah .
#Text=Guys do that all the time .
#Text=" Bolin says : " How ?
#Text=" Mako says : " Just tell her you 're not that into her anymore .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , no , no , I do n't think she 'd like that .
#Text=" Mako says : " Ending a relationship is kind of like pulling off a blood - sucking leech .
#Text=You just got ta rip it off and get it over with .
#Text=You 'll feel a lot better afterwards .
#Text=Trust me .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Thanks , Mako .
#Text=Whew .
#Text=I 'm lucky you 're so good at breaking girls ' hearts .
#Text=Ha , Korra better watch out .
#Text=Oooh , no , it 's just a - , uh , you kn - , uh , never mind .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Our next training sessions is n't until tomorrow .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm sorry to interrupt .
#Text=It 's about our conversation this morning .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Yes ?
#Text=" Korra says : " I understand why you brought your troops here , but I 'm afraid it 's sending the wrong message .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Your father has been talking to you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Not just him .
#Text=Varrick too .
#Text=There was a meeting at my parents ' house .
#Text=A lot of Southerners feel like their tribe is being invaded .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " I am their chief .
#Text=I 'm uniting , not invading .
#Text=" Korra says : " I know , but I 'm just afraid if something does n't change , there could be a civil war .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " If the Water Tribes were at war , the other nations would take sides .
#Text=The dark spirits would thrive off this negative energy , and the world would be thrown into a battle between spirits and man .
#Text=That would be catastrophic .
#Text=" Korra says : " How do we stop it ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " We ?
#Text=No , Korra .
#Text=This is a war only the Avatar can prevent .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'm usually the one starting fights .
#Text=I do n't know how to stop them from happening .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " As the Avatar , you must remain neutral in this conflict .
#Text=You will naturally want to help your people , but showing favoritism will not help our tribes finds unity .
#Text=" Korra says : " Maybe Tenzin was right .
#Text=Maybe I 'm not ready to be the Avatar .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Tenzin lacked faith in you .
#Text=But I have no doubt that you will become the most admired Avatar the world has ever known .
#Text=" Korra says : " Thank you , Uncle .
#Text="
